data.title: Tarumanagara University [2024 Rankings by topic]
data.meta_description: Tarumanagara University ranked 63rd in Indonesia and 3684th in the World 2024 overall rankings, while got 304th place for Investment Banking and Stock trading and top 50% for 42 other topics. See all 152 academic rankings both national and global.
data.meta_site_name: EduRank.org - Discover university rankings by location
data.text:
Tarumanagara University: Rankings

Updated: February 29, 2024

EduRank

Tarumanagara University ranked 63rd in Indonesia, 3684th in the global 2024 rating, and scored in the TOP 50% across 43 research topics. Tarumanagara University ranking is based on 3 factors: research output (EduRank's index has 10,162 academic publications and 4,415 citations attributed to the university), non-academic reputation, and the impact of 6 notable alumni.

Ranking Category #3684 of 14,131 In the World #1241 of 5,830 In Asia #63 of 562 In Indonesia #304 of 1,716 For Investment Banking and Stock trading #319 of 1,006 For Entertainment Industry Business #347 of 1,052 For Real Estate #2804 of 7,738 For Alumni Impact #5579 of 14,131 For Non-academic Prominence Top50% For 40 other topics
